Class Recognize

java.lang.Object
  Recognize

public class Recognize
extends java.lang.Object

Recognizes the best matched item compared to a WAVFeature

getShortestPath

public int getShortestPath()
Used for recognizing the word 'computer'. This function returns a value which represents the difference between the sample and the word computer. The smaller the number the better the match.

getShortestPath

private int getShortestPath(int[][] matrix)
Find the length of the shortest path in the given matrix

Parameters:
matrix -
